title: Episode 327: Can Vegans Eat P*ssy? (NLE Choppa)
itunes:title: Episode 327: Can Vegans Eat P*ssy? (NLE Choppa)
description:
Rapper, NLE Choppa joins the ladies of Lip Service to promote his latest single, "Letter to my Daughter." NLE Choppa speaks on his evolution as a man after having his daughter, how becoming vegan has enhanced his sex life, his ideas for having a polygamous colony, and much more! He even shares a wild story in which he was fighting some lady's ex and his friend pulled a gun on him...enjoy!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
